definitions.definition: The upper part of some upper garments (such as a shirt or jacket ) that folds back at or near the neck to give the appearance of a collar or lapel . Unlike a collar, the rever is always formed from the same piece of fabric as the rest of the garment's bodice .

main_definition: The upper part of some upper garments (such as a shirt or jacket ) that folds back at or near the neck to give the appearance of a collar or lapel . Unlike a collar, the rever is always formed from the same piece of fabric as the rest of the garment's bodice .
